short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Close or Go to your tabs easily.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Easy Tabs will help you to navigate to a specific tab quickly. Also you can close the other tabs easily from the current tab. Close all tabs under the same domain option also available. 

Available Keyboard Shortcuts: 
  Default: "Shift+Ctrl+Space"
  Mac: "Shift+Command+Space"
  Windows: "Shift+Ctrl+Space"
